title: Elegant Diamond Kadas - Modern Bangles with a Touch of Tradition
materials: G Color). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: These Kadas feature a contemporary design with alternating gold and diamond-studded floral motifs. The open-ended design allows for easy wearing and a comfortable fit. The high polish gold accentuates the brilliance of the diamonds.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: or as a sophisticated everyday accessory. Perfect for pairing with both traditional sarees and modern outfits.
description: Crafted with the finest 22K gold and meticulously set diamonds, these bangles offer a blend of modern aesthetics and timeless elegance. The open-ended design ensures a comfortable fit for most wrist sizes. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting shine, making them a cherished heirloom piece.
